Th-that looked intense...
T-those are really cute...
I think those are really cute, ~name~...
Those are really cute, ~name~.
(She's not wearing a bra!? She must be really brave...)
(~name~ is really beautiful...)
(I didn't realize just how pretty ~name~ was...)
(I didn't notice just how cute ~name~ is...)
Just that, huh?
Oh... That's a bit of a letdown...
I wish I had stuff like that left...
You stll had that!?
Oh... I see...
(M-m-maybe I should just go for it...)
(Chiaki seems so friendly, I'm sure she'd say yes if I just asked to hang out with her...)
(What's the worst that could happen? She says no? That would be bad, but... I still want to try and be friends with her...)
(That's right... She was more of a shut in than I was!)
Is being a detective like.., an actual job for you?
Yeah!
Woah!
You're taking off some seriously big things now!
That's a little intense, don't you think?
What the!?
(Maybe I was wrong about her...)
(But they still seem so close...)
M-m-maybe if you were free sometime... Would you, uh... Could you maybe...
D-d-d-do you th-th-think we could... Uh...
I guess it's better than taking off an accessory...
Are you just going to remove small stuff?
Is that it?
Oh... just your ~clothing~?
(But also... So nice...)
I don't think I've ever felt that good when I did it.
I don't think I've ever felt that good when I did it.
(I bet that ~name~ has a better chest than I do...)
(Another girl's chest...)
(Should I be looking?)
I never had any friends, so I haven't ever seen another girl's chest... I'm a bit nervous...
Surely she won't strip her bra with a bullet...
I guess it's Futaba's turn to strip.
It's weird watching someone else do it...
I was hoping for a bit more, but that's alright, I guess...
I was hoping for a bit more, but I guess this is fine...
I guess that that's fine...
I guess I shouldn't have expected so much...
I feel really embarrassed right now...
C-can see just move on now?
Anyway, let's move on...
(Maybe I should let Aimee win... I don't want to get hit by one of her bullets...)
(I want to go home...)
(I'm scared...)
(She must know exactly what she's doing... She's so cool and confident...)
Do you think we could... Play videogames together... Sometime?
(What am I doing wrong?)
(~name~ just took off her ~clothing~...)
(I shouldn't stare... but she's really pretty...)
Oh... you must have been through a lot, Kyoko...
W-wait!? Now ~name~ has to show his?
W-w-w-w-wait! I've never seen a p-p-p-penis before!
I really don't do this kind of thing often!
S-s-so does this mean we can be friends now?

text.content: I... Don't want you to see me like this...
Do you want sex? Is that it?
What did I do to deserve this?
I really don't know how to thank you...
Nobody has ever shown me this much kindness...
Before you came along... My life had been hell...
And then when I thought I did... It turns out they weren't my friends at all...
Then after that... I got addicted to drugs and sex...
Then I... even got kicked out of my home...
It just seemed like nothing could go right for me...
You've been so kind to me...
You've given me food... shelter... clothes...
You've even helped raise this child...
You've done nothing but help me, and never asked for anything in return...
I really can't tell overstate just how important you are to me.
You really did save my life.
Like you went out of your way...
Just to give me a happy ending...
I really don't know where I'd be without you...
